title: Everything gone after 2-3 years???
body: soo.. I logged in after a couple years of not playing, only to find all my characters and skins gone... missing.  checked my purchase history, nothing, checked my match history, nothing, all I have is the fact I am still level 30.  I played for hundreds of hours to achieve these characters and skins and even spent up to 100$ on my collection.  yet I still have about 210 RP  and 2000 IP? only thing that saved in my account was my level, and my points, everything else, GONE!?!? contacted support and got one answer that said everything looks in order but how the hell could I have gotten level 30 without even 1 purchase or even 1 match???

replies.body:
This account hasn't been deleted or anything, and does look like all of it's content is still there. We can't go into details, but this account does currently own several champions and skins. It even still has some of the old icons from the Shurima Event and the 2014 Lunar Revel icon. 

If you aren't seeing any content whatsoever, you might, in fact, be logging into the wrong account. If you need help figuring things out, I'd suggest reaching out to our account team again in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
They delete accounts that are inactive for a year-ish+

Named get recycled, but the accounts shouldn't be deleted.

You can check which champions and skins you own in the Collection tab. Is it possible that you may have played on an alternate account?
